item.title: resume
item.description: 778-240-3248 ryan@coda.life github.com/ryjen ca.linkedin.com/in/ryjen https://coda.life (Robert) Ryan Jennings Self-taught programmer since 2002, formally educated in Computer Systems at BCIT with distinction. Started professionally in quality assurance and embedded systems and been a part of the mobile revolution for 8 years on multiple platforms and languages. Pragmatism has been a guiding philosophy during education and professional life.
